description: Cameron Foster is being bitched at by his cunty wife because he hasn’t got a job. He has had enough of her shitty attitude and decides to get back at her by fucking a dude. Unknowingly, the guy he agrees to drill his cock into is actually his wife’s cute bro, Luke Adams. Luke is all over Cameron’s hot cock and Cameron rewards his brother in law’s horny ass by pounding him like no tomorrow.
title: My Brother In Law Part 5
